com.haojie.dao.commentFavorDao

接口 CommentFavorDao

  • 所有已知实现类:
    CommentFavorDaoImpl

    public interface CommentFavorDao
    The DAO layer for commentfavor

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      To add a comment favor into database

    • 方法详细资料

      • favorExists

        boolean favorExists(int uid,
                    int commentID)
        To check whether the user has favored the comment
        参数:
        uid - The uid of user
        commentID - The commentID of a comment
        返回:
        If user has favored the comment, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • addCommentFavor

        boolean addCommentFavor(CommentFavor commentFavor)
        To add a comment favor into database
        参数:
        commentFavor - The object entity of comment favor
        返回:
        If adding succeeds, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • getCommentFavor

        CommentFavor getCommentFavor(int commentID)

      • deleteCommentFavor

        boolean deleteCommentFavor(int uid,
                           int commentID)
        Delete user's favor for the comment from the database
        参数:
        uid - User's uid
        commentID - Comment's commentID
        返回:
        If successful, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.
